it.polimi.ingsw.ps03.networking.client

Class LocalView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps03.networking.client.LocalView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class LocalView
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    this class shows to the client all the possible actions and instantiates objects that represents them.
    Author:
    Amministratore

    • Method Detail

      • initGame

        public void initGame()

      • startTurn

        public void startTurn(Billboard billboard)
        Is the principal function of the class 'BillboardView'. It receives the already edited model (billboard in our case) and an integer that represents the player that is called at playing. In this method we give an output on the screen representing all the possible actions that a player can do. After choosing one, a specified method will be called to ask and process all the details necessary to build the object 'Action'.
        Parameters:
        billboard - Billboard

      • selectAction

        public ActionChoices selectAction()
        In this method we simply show the possible actions and after taking one, we return it to the method that called this.

      • placeAction

        public void placeAction(Billboard billboard,
                        int turnOfPlayer)
        After showing available rooms (action spaces) and pawns, this method builds the object 'Action' asking the user what to do. After this a setChanged() and a notifyObservers(action) with argument the action object just built. This will be processed by the Controller.
        Parameters:
        billboard - Billboard
        turnOfPlayer - Int that represents who has to move

      • subPlacementCoins

        public void subPlacementCoins(Resources resources,
                              ClientPlace action)

      • pawnChoice

        public java.lang.String pawnChoice(Player player)
        Method that helps showing all the possible pawns to place and gets the input from the user.
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        Returns:
        String representing the chosen pawn

      • roomChoice

        public int roomChoice(java.util.List<Room> rooms)
        Method that helps showing all the possible rooms and gets the input from the user. It will return an integer representing the chosen room.
        Parameters:
        rooms - List
        Returns:
        int

      • towerRoomChoice

        public int towerRoomChoice(java.util.List<TowerRoom> towerRooms)

      • showModel

        public void showModel(Billboard billboard)
        Method always called by the update method. It will show the current situation of the billboard, with particular regard to rooms. So it will not show player's resources and the personal board in general. Will be given an action able to show player's personal board.
        Parameters:
        billboard - Billboard

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object obj)
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
